programme.title: Hot dog
programme.desc: A pair of Tactical Units Police Officers from different walks of life come together to rescue an ambassador's daughter.

programme.title: Meander
programme.desc: A woman gets locked in series of strange tubes full of deadly traps.

programme.title: Narco Soldiers
programme.desc: Narco Soldiers is a timely, action-packed crime thriller that explores the resurgence of the Caribbean drug routes and one couple's violent, Bonnie and Clyde-style rise to power.

programme.title: Monochrome
programme.desc: A disillusioned young woman becomes a serial killer a brilliant detective to use his unusual neurological condition to track her down.

programme.title: Defiant
programme.desc: When framed for the murder of the New Worldï¿½s Sovereign Leader, a young soldier must choose whether he can still embrace the New World knowing what he now knows, or if his allegiances have become Defiant.

programme.title: Trigger
programme.desc: Trigger is a frantic, fast-paced action-packed twist and turn race to a future that may or may not exist anymore.

programme.title: Initiation
programme.desc: Five strangers are kidnapped and brought to a mysterious house in the woods, thrown into a cell and stripped of their belongings. programme.title: Paint It Red
programme.desc: A pair of bank robbers knock off Bohemian tenants in search for their stolen loot.

programme.title: Necropath
programme.desc: A mentally deranged maniac stalks victims to fulfill his drug addiction and sedate psychosis until he becomes the victim of an unexpected invasion of the undead. This is a prototype film, to be used to present for future larger production.

programme.title: Stray Dogs
programme.desc: After a man's beloved dog passes, he embarks on a backpacking trip with his brother to bury his dog where he found him. Along the way they encounter a stranger on the run who turns their world upside down. The brothers must unite in order to survive and finish the mission.
